name: div
features: Height : Over the calf design for full-length coverage
Material : Durable nylon blend for a balanced feel and performance
Cushioning : Medium cushioning with performance padding for impact protection
Moisture & Odor Control : FRESHTEK™ technology wicks away sweat & neutralizes odor
Airflow : Channeled air cushioning & performance mesh enhance breathability
Ankle Protection : Engineered design supports and shields the ankle during movement
Arch Support : Performance arch support for improved fit & reduced fatigue
Toe Comfort : Seamless toe closure helps prevent irritation
Heel Fit : Deep heel pocket ensures a secure, stay-put fit
Fabric Composition : 75% nylon, 17% polyester, 4% combed cotton, 4% elastane
